text: Bernieulles is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated some 8 miles(13 km) north of Montreuil-sur-Mer, on the D147 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bernieulles
